channel.title: Nikola on CKolumbus' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nikola on CKolumbus' Blog

item.title: Blog Switch From Nikola to Hugo
item.description: After starting to look more int GO programming I also inteded to revive my outdated blog on github. Although I’m veteran Pythonista I felt a little bit stuck with the complexity and the missing reactive designs of Nikola with which I started my blog. Digging more into the Go ecosystem I stumpled across Hugo and played around for a night, and with my limited number of existing posts swichting was easily done.
